description:
After Komichi completes the fifty-meter dash with the fastest time in her class, several athletic clubs try to recruit her. but Komichi can`t decide which club she wants to join because there are too many things she wants to try. Following a random turn of events, she exhanges contact information with Tanigawa Kei, the brightest girl in the class, who is also having trouble deciding which club to join. Komichi still hasn`t reached a decision when Tomono, who has decided to join the literature club, offers to visit all the different clubs with her. At last, Komichi makes up her mind...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hast du dich schon für einen Klub entschieden?
Have You Decided On a Club?
